現金收付表: receipt and disbursement statement，receipt and payment account

變現清算損益帳戶: realization and liquidation profit and loss account

應付款項對購貨比率: ratio of trade account payable to purchase

盈餘對資本淨值比率: ratio of surplus to net worth

速動資產對流動負債比率: ratio of quick asset to current liability

銷貨淨額對應收款項比率: ratio of net sale to receivable

銷貨淨額對業主權益比率: ratio of net sale to proprietorship

營業利益對銷貨淨額比率: ratio of net operating profit to net sale

淨益對資產總額比率: ratio of net income to total asset

淨益對業主權益比率: ratio of net income to proprietorship

淨益對淨發股本比率: ratio of net income to outstanding stock

淨益對銷貨淨額比率: ratio of net income to net sale

資本對負債比率: ratio of inside to outside equities

固定負債對擔保資產比率: ratio of fixed liability to asset held for security

固定資產對資產總額比率: ratio of fixed asset to total asset

固定資產對資本比率: ratio of fixed asset to capital

流動負債對負債總額比率: ratio of current liability to total liability

流動資產對資產總額比率: ratio of current asset to total asset

現金對流動負債比率: ratio of cash to current liability

資本對流動負債比率: ratio of capital to current liability

銷貨成本與營業費用對銷貨淨額比率: ratio analysis cost of sale and operating expense to net sale

報酬率法(資本預算): rate of return method (of capital budgeting)

邊際率，毛利率: rate of margin，rate of gross profit

變產損益帳戶: profit and loss on realization account

防止不當支出: prevention of unwise or inappropriate expenditure

防止不法支出: prevention of expenditures for illegal purposes

一元現值每期付款: periodic payment with present value of 1

應收東夥票據: note receivable from officers，stockholders and employees

可舉債淨收入，可舉債淨所入: net revenue available for debt service

銷售淨利: net profit on sales，net trading profit

應收欠稅利息與罰款: interest and penalties receivable on taxes

組織預算會計三位一體: identity of organizational，budgetary and accounting unit

銷售毛利: gross profit on sales，gross trading profit

政府分擔特賦改良物成本: governmental unit's share of assessment improvement costs

普通長期債務帳類: general long-term debt group of accounts

普通長期債務本息帳類: general long-term debt and interest group of accounts

財產統制帳: general ledger for properties and commodities

普通固定資產帳類: general fixed assets group of accounts

普通債券本息帳類: general bonded-debt and interest group of accounts

資金表，資金運用表: funds statement，statement of application of funds

十足信用債券，普通負擔債券: full faith and credit bond，general obligation bond

預計欠稅利息與罰款損失: estimated uncollectible interest and penalties on taxes

按售價估計存貨損失: estimated loss from sales valuation of merchandise inventory

餘額倍減加速折舊法: double declining-balance method of accelerated depreciation

盈餘分配表: disposition of net income，disposition of net profit，disposition of net earnings

股本折價: discount on stock，discount on capital stock

年數加總折舊法: depreciation-sum of the year digit method

定率遞減折舊法: depreciation-fixed percentage of diminishing value method

變率折舊法: depreciation-changing percentage of cost less scrap method

平均收帳期: days' sales on the book，average collection period

美國聯邦政府審計長: comptroller general of the United States

交代清結證明書: certificate of completion of handling over charge

攤還股本: capital returned to stock holders in dividends

包括運費價格: C & F，cost and freight，C & F price

收入憑證簿: book of original documents for payments for receipts

支付憑證簿: book of original documents for payments

通用平衡表: balance sheet for all purpose，all purpose balance sheet

永續盤存制: balance of stock system，balance of stores system

帳戶式損益表: balance form of profit and loss statement，account form of profit and loss statement

上年結轉餘額: balance brought forward from last year

資金運用表: application of fund statement，statement of application of funds

未支配剩餘變動分析表: analysis of changes in unappropriated surplus

美國會計師協會: AICPA，American Institute of Certified Public Accountants

報告式損益表: report form profit and loss statement

壞帳損失準備: reserve for loss on doubtful accounts

收回優先股準備: reserve for redemption of preferred stock
reserve for retirement of preferred stock

償債基金債券償還準備: reserve for retirement of sinking fund bonds

未實現資產增價準備: reserve for unrealized increment in assets value

精算臆測差異準備: reserve for variations in actuarial assumption

銷貨客戶餘額表: schedule of customers' balances in sales ledger

推銷與管理費用分析表: selling and administrative expense analysis sheet

計入成本的推銷與管理費用: selling and administrative expense charged to cost

資金來源去路表，資金運用表: source-and-disposition statement，source-and-uses statement，statement of application of funds

分批成本制: specific order cost system，job order cost system

資產負債表，平衡表: statement of assets and liabilities，balance sheet

現金收付表: statement of cash receipts and disbursements

財務狀況變動表: statement of changes in financial position

財務狀況表: statement of condition，statement of financial condition

製造與銷貨成本表: statement of cost to manufacture and cost of goods sold

支出與保留數對核定經費比較表: statement of expenditures and encumbrance compared with appropriations

財務收益與費用表: statement of financial income and expenses

資金運用表: statement of funds and its application，statement of application of funds

損益表: statement of loss and gain，statement of profit and loss

現金收付結存表: statement of receipts and disbursements and cash balance

資金來源運用表，資金運用表: statement of resources and their application，statement of application of funds

預計所入與實際所入比較表: statement of revenue estimated and actual

推銷與管理費用表: statement of selling and administrative expenses

資金來源運用表: statement of sources and application of funds，statement of sources and disposition of funds

實際與已分配製造費用彙總表: summary of standing order and applied manufacturing expense

現金收付彙總表: summary statement of cash receipts and disbursements

收入與支出彙總表: summary statement of receipts and expenditures

資力負擔彙總表: summary statement of resources and obligations

代征他級政府賦稅: taxes levied for other governmental unit

損益表: trading and profit and loss statement，profit and loss statement

實際利率: true rate of interest，effective rate of interest
